list_definition.definition: a rough sketch or outline of something, especially written

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’ve made a rough draft of my speech.

list_definition.definition: an order (to a bank etc) for the payment of money

list_definition.definition: to conscript into the army etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was drafted into the Navy.
